App Name: WebSaver
Description:
WebSaver is a modern and elegant app designed to help users save and organize the websites they visit. With a minimalist design and user-friendly interface, WebSaver makes it easy to bookmark and categorize your favorite websites for quick access. Whether youâ€™re browsing for work, personal interests, or educational purposes, WebSaver ensures that your important links are always at your fingertips.

Key Features:
Bookmark Websites: Easily save the websites you visit with a single click.
Categorize Links: Organize your bookmarks into categories such as News, Entertainment, Educational, Personal, and Work.
Search and Filter: Quickly find saved websites using the search and filter options.
Export and Import: Export your saved websites to a JSON file and import them back whenever needed.
Email List: Send your saved list of websites to your email for easy access and sharing.
Responsive Design: Enjoy a seamless experience across different devices with a responsive and elegant design.
How It Works:
Save Websites: Use the WebSaver extension to save the current website URL and categorize it.
View Saved Sites: Access your saved websites from the WebSaver dashboard, where you can view, edit, and delete bookmarks.
Sort and Filter: Sort your bookmarks by category, date, or name, and filter them based on your preferences.
Email List: Enter your email address and receive a neatly formatted list of your saved websites directly in your inbox.
Benefits:
Efficiency: Save time by quickly accessing your favorite websites without the need to remember URLs.
Organization: Keep your bookmarks organized and categorized for easy retrieval.
Accessibility: Access your saved websites from any device with a responsive design.
Sharing: Easily share your saved list of websites with others via email.
Target Audience:
WebSaver is ideal for professionals, students, researchers, and anyone who frequently browses the internet and wants to keep their favorite websites organized and easily accessible.
